title: Fix crash on Share my contact code on Windows
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### User Story

As a user, I want to be able to share my QR code on Windows so that other users can easily add me.

### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: An error appears when clicking on `Share my contact code`.

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)

The contact QR code appears.

#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/138074/48531940-9cec2a80-e89e-11e8-95bd-9af0acf3f0cf.png)

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Go to Profile
- Click on Share my contact code

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
* Operating System: Windows

#### Logs

[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/2583750/Status.log)

[comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat)

This issue has been automatically closed. Please re-open if this issue is important to you.
Still a problem, and now also on Linux Nix branch.
